title: Credits
author: admin
content:
# Credits

... and building blocks.

**Prime free font** - unique sans serif techy fonts by Fontfabric™ [fontfabric.com](http://fontfabric.com/prime-free-font/)

**HTML5 Boilerplate** - <cite>The webâ€™s most popular front-end template</cite> [html5boilerplate.com](http://html5boilerplate.com/)

**Foundation 4** - <cite>The most advanced responsive front-end framework in the world.</cite> [foundation.zurb.com](http://foundation.zurb.com)

**Apache CouchDB** - <cite>is a database that completely embraces the web.</cite> [couchdb.apache.org](http://couchdb.apache.org/)

**Mouch** - <cite>Couchapp Purism</cite> [github.com/jo/mouch](http://jo.github.com/mouch/)

**Coup.js** - <cite>Tiny script plays client side with CouchDB rewrites, lists and shows.</cite> [github.com/jo/coup.js](https://github.com/jo/coup.js)
